data.name: Typer Hero (打字英雄)
data.detailed_description:
Your village is being invaded by monsters, and only you and your keyboard can defeat them.
Every monster has a word above them, defeat the monster by typing out the word . Defend your village by stop the monsters from reaching the bottom of the screen.
There are different types of monsters and bosses, they all have interesting abilities. Can you stop them by excellent typing skills ?
Little tip, it's a typing game, so even the menu items are triggered by typing. For example, start to play by typing "Start Game" when at the startup menu.
It has two different difficulty modes, and the survive mode will appear after you complete the game at the first time.
If you still feel the game is way too easy, please try to type out the title on the startup sreen, and enjoy your game.

Updated this game on 10/04 and fixed the bugs such as a space befor one word or some word offscreen.

data.short_description: Your village is being invaded by monsters。Every monster has a word above them, defeat the monster by typing out the word . Defend your village by stop the monsters from reaching the bottom of the screen.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
